description:
This course will teach you the fundamentals of the Indian Vocal Music.

Traditionally this knowledge was only attained by studying with a guru. Now we are bringing the guru to your fingertips, to get you playing in weeks, not years.

Indian vocal music consists of Classical Music- Dhrupad & Khayal, Semi Classical- Thumri, Ghazal, Bhajan, Qawaali, Light - Bollywood.
Singing is usually accompanied by Tabla, Pakhawaj or Dholak.

You will have a solid foundation of knowledge to progress to our course on jannatmusic . com or if you have a guru who can guide you to mastery in Classical, Semi Classical and Bollywood Singing

The curriculum is structured into 3 sections to build upon your knowledge at each step.
1. Get to know Vocals
2. Vocal Anatomy
3. Introduction to Indian Music with Vocals
4. Vocal Exercises

Join now to unlock your inner artist.
title: Step by Step Indian Vocal Course- Bollywood & Classical
